scenario_text.value:
You must not come any closer! Do you hear
me?!

That jerk, he won’t even talk! It’s like he
thinks he’ll blab the moment he does!

Takuma, Agumon! You gotta help me out next
time we run into him!

Ain’t no way I’ll let him run again... We’ll
surround him, then we’ll grab him!

Okay then, you grab his attention, then me
and Agumon will circle behind him.

So we should just roll up all sneaky-like!
Roger that!

Let’s hurry and find <color=#B41919>Falcomon</color>! He can’t have
gone too far.
